types:type.name: Employee_Details
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Employee_Details = {| empName: String, empid: String, salary: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empmail: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empName\\\":\\\"suresh\\\",\\\"empid\\\":\\\"1234\\\",\\\"salary\\\":5600,\\\"empmail\\\":\\\"abc@gmail.com\\\"}"}

types:type.name: OutputEmp
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type OutputEmp = {| empName: String, empid: String, salary: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empmail: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empName\\\":\\\"suresh\\\",\\\"empid\\\":\\\"1234\\\",\\\"salary\\\":5600,\\\"empmail\\\":\\\"abc@gmail.com\\\"}"}

types:type.name: Bookoutput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Bookoutput = {| item: {| "type": String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, properties: {| title: String, author: Array<String>, year: String, language: String, location: String |} |} |} {"example": "{\\\"item\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"book\\\",\\\"price\\\":30,\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"title\\\":\\\"Everday italian\\\",\\\"author\\\":[\\\"george\\\"],\\\"year\\\":\\\"2005\\\",\\\"language\\\":\\\"En\\\",\\\"location\\\":\\\"usa\\\"}}}"}

types:type.name: EmpCSV
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type EmpCSV = Array<{| EmpName: String, EmpId: String, EmpSal: String, EmpEmail: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0", "separator": ","}
